code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import'./card_product.css';import{Button,Card,CardBody,CardSubtitle,CardText,CardTitle}from'reactstrap';import img_product from'../../Img/product.jpg';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{AppContext}from'../../AppContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CardProduct=pros=>{const{ite}=pros;const{product,addCart,cart}=useContext(AppContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-xl-3 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{style:{width:'18rem'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/Products/".concat(ite.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:"Sample",src:img_product})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:ite.status?"status":"statusactive",children:ite.status}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardBody,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardSubtitle,{className:"mb-2 text-muted",tag:"h6",children:ite.collection}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quality",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"star",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fa-solid fa-star"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fa-solid fa-star"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fa-solid fa-star"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fa-solid fa-star"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fa-solid fa-star"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"(123)"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardTitle,{tag:"h5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/Products/".concat(ite.id),children:ite.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardText,{children:["USD$",ite.cost,".00"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>addCart(ite.id),children:"Add to cart"})]})]})});};export default CardProduct;
